query:
ALTER TABLE materials 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lowStockEmailSent BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastEmailSentAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS supplierEmail VARCHAR(255);

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3rf55phMSy1Bqm7.root --database XQpiGbEcueWdnyaoEtKtzk --execute ALTER TABLE materials 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lowStockEmailSent BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastEmailSentAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS supplierEmail VARCHAR(255);
